title: yay for new malzahar skin :DDDDDD
body: ty riot for making dreams come true :')

replies.body:
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2014/11/1119-pbe-update.html
I want all of them.
every.
single.
one.
I really wish I did not just buy Overlord Malzahar last week. This one looks so good!

Kinda wish they spent a bit more time and made the Thresh skin 1350 though.

Yeah, sorry, no one cares about the new Malz skin. This thread is now about Thresh.{{champion:412}}

> Kinda wish they spent a bit more time and made the Thresh skin 1350 though.
> 
> Yeah, sorry, no one cares about the new Malz skin. This thread is now about Thresh.{{champion:412}}

They probably have better 1350 skin ideas for Thresh. All 1350 would have done to that skin is add a different voice/lines.
Free rp pls. I want the next {{champion:412}} skin
Just give me that Thresh skin. That is badassery incarnate.
Time to buy RP.. those skins are FEICKING AWESOME!
An Orianna skin that actually looks good? And that Thresh skin mah gawd. I think I came.
Fk the Malzahar skin! Sejuani is where it's at!

> Fk the Malzahar skin! Sejuani is where it's at!

True. Out of the Snowdown skins for this year, Sejuani is the only interesting one, but still probably won't buy. I was expecting a Zac or Vel'Koz skin.
